edu.ncsu.csc216.backlog.scrum_backlog

Class TaskItemList

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ncsu.csc216.backlog.scrum_backlog.TaskItemList

  • public class TaskItemList
extends java.lang.Object
    Concrete class used to manage all tasks during Scrum Backlog's execution. The TaskItemList maintains a List of TaskItem objects and has support for adding, removing, searching for, updating, and filtering TaskItems.
    Author:
    Steven Mayo

    • Method Detail

      • addTaskItem

        public int addTaskItem(java.lang.String title,
                       TaskItem.Type type,
                       java.lang.String creator,
                       java.lang.String note)
        Adds a TaskItem to the TaskItemList using the specified parameters for TaskItem: title, Type, creator, and note.
        Parameters:
        title - Title of the TaskItem.
        type - Type of the TaskItem.
        creator - Creator of the TaskItem.
        note - Note designated for the TaskItem.
        Returns:
        The unique ID number of the newly created TaskItem.

      • addXMLTasks

        public void addXMLTasks(java.util.List<edu.ncsu.csc216.task.xml.Task> tasklist)
        Add's a list of Tasks to the current TaskItemList.
        Parameters:
        tasklist - List of Task's to add to the TaskItemList.

      • getTaskItems

        public java.util.List<TaskItem> getTaskItems()
        Getter method that returns the current list of TaskItems.
        Returns:
        The list of TaskItems.

      • getTaskItemsByOwner

        public java.util.List<TaskItem> getTaskItemsByOwner(java.lang.String owner)
        Getter method that returns a filtered list of TaskItems. The owner is used as means for filtering the current TaskItemList.
        Parameters:
        owner - Owner of the TaskItem.
        Returns:
        List of TaskItem objects that are filtered by the TaskItem owner name.

      • getTasksByCreator

        public java.util.List<TaskItem> getTasksByCreator(java.lang.String creator)
        Getter method that returns a filtered list of TaskItems. The Task creator is used as means for filtering the current TaskItemList.
        Parameters:
        creator - Creator of the TaskItem.
        Returns:
        List of TaskItem objects that are filtered by the TaskItem creator name.

      • getTaskItemById

        public TaskItem getTaskItemById(int id)
        Getter method that searches for, and retrieves, the TaskItem associated with the provided unique ID number.
        Parameters:
        id - Unique ID number of the TaskItem to retrieve.
        Returns:
        TaskItem associated with the provided unique ID number. creator name.

      • executeCommand

        public void executeCommand(int id,
                           Command command)
        Updates a TaskItem in the list through execution of the passed in Command parameter.
        Parameters:
        id - The Unique ID number of the TaskItem.
        command - Command to perform on the TaskItem.

      • deleteTaskItemById

        public void deleteTaskItemById(int id)
        Deletes the TaskItem in the TaskItemList using the specified unique ID parameter.
        Parameters:
        id - Unique ID number of the TaskItem to delete.
